t: Amazon.com closes deal to buy MGM movie studio | Reuters
s: March 17, 2022 - Amazon.com Inc on Thursday said it had closed its $8.5 billion deal to buy MGM, combining the fabled moviemaker behind "Rocky" and James Bond with the online retailing giant as it looks to draw consumers through more streaming video.
